page.title: 16 FRILFORD HEATH GOLF COURSE
page.content: GOLF is an important RECREATION in the 1980's.Frilford Heath is one of the county's most scenic and exclusive clubs. The first CLUB dates back to the turn of the century,when a course was set up on the Wootton Road in Abingdon. Shorly after it moved to Shippon and in 1912 to its present location at Frilford. The first 18 hole course was designed under the supervision of J.H. Taylor,a well-known professional of the time. Since then more lhas been acquired and a further 18 hole course added. The LANDSCAPE is ideal for a golf course,with its poor sandy,soils and a natural vegetation comprising largely of heather and gorse.
